summary: A group of former Encyclopedia Brown-style child-detectives struggle to solve an adult mystery.

Pierson|Dominic Dierkes|Aubrey Plaza|Glenn Kalison|Peter Saati|Kay Cannon|Bobby Moynihan|Matt Walsh|John Lutz|Robbie Sublett|Tom Shillue|Kevin Dotcom Brown|Ellie Kemper|Jon Daly|Will Hines|Gregory Burke|Neil Casey|Lillian Chandler|Daphne Ciccarelle|Dan Eckman|George Eckman|Cheryl Freeman|Joe James|Heidi May Johnson|Anthony King|Kristopher Kling|John Kneeland|Meggie McFadden|Nick Packard|Ben Rodgers|Xavier Salazar|Calvin Santiago|Ben Schwartz|John Sefel|Ron Simons|Steve Stout|Ben Tabor|Danielle Morse
title: Mystery Team
